original_title: SJB group decide not to support a national govt.
original_body_lines: A group of Samagi Jana Blawegaya (SJB) Parliamentarians has unanimously decided not to support the establishment of a national government under the incumbent President Ranil Wickremesinghe.
The proposal brought forth by MP Buddhika Pathirana today (02) has been unanimously approved by the SJB Parliamentary group this way.
